contentfulSermon.title: Romans Week 2: Why We All Need Jesus

fields.notesFormatted:
Romans 1:18-32

Steps to cultural decay

  1. Ignore God. (vs. 21)
  2. Redefine God. (vs. 22-23)
  3. Set aside all sexual restraints. (vs. 24-27)
  4. Set aside all relational restraints. (vs. 28-31)
  5. Promote & celebrate sin. (vs. 32)

Take Away

  1. This isn’t a list to show us why everyone else needs Jesus. It’s meant to show us why we need Jesus.
  2. The solution to a messed up culture isn’t to make non-Christians to live like Christians. It’s to introduce everyone to Jesus.
